subject: World Series
lead_paragraph: Carlos Peña’s sixth-inning single to left field scored the tying run for the Rays which will hold up until the teams take the field to finish Game 5, whenever that will be.
snippet: Carlos Peña’s sixth-inning single to left field scored the tying run for the Rays which will hold up until the teams take the field to finish Game 5, whenever that will be.
